itemlayout.condition: Control.IsVisible(555) + ![Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(singles) | Container.Content(songs)]

focusedlayout.condition: Control.IsVisible(555) + ![Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(singles) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.visible: IsEmpty(ListItem.Plot) + !ControlGroup(300).HasFocus + Control.IsVisible(555) + !Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) + ![Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(singles) | Container.Content(songs)]
